resource.description: Describes an endpoint authorization for authorizing Redshift-managed VPC endpoint access to a cluster across AWS accounts.

properties.name: Account
properties.description: The target AWS account ID to grant or revoke access for.

type.description: The target AWS account ID to grant or revoke access for.

properties.name: Force
properties.description: Indicates whether to force the revoke action. If true, the Redshift-managed VPC endpoints associated with the endpoint authorization are also deleted.

type.description: Indicates whether to force the revoke action. If true, the Redshift-managed VPC endpoints associated with the endpoint authorization are also deleted.

properties.name: VpcIds
properties.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) identifiers to grant or revoke access to.

type.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) identifiers to grant or revoke access to.

attributes.description: Describes an endpoint authorization for authorizing Redshift-managed VPC endpoint access to a cluster across AWS accounts.

properties.name: AllowedAllVPCs
properties.description: Indicates whether all VPCs in the grantee account are allowed access to the cluster.

type.description: Indicates whether all VPCs in the grantee account are allowed access to the cluster.

properties.name: AllowedVPCs
properties.description: The VPCs allowed access to the cluster.

type.description: The VPCs allowed access to the cluster.

properties.name: AuthorizeTime
properties.description: The time (UTC) when the authorization was created.

type.description: The time (UTC) when the authorization was created.

properties.name: EndpointCount
properties.description: The number of Redshift-managed VPC endpoints created for the authorization.

type.description: The number of Redshift-managed VPC endpoints created for the authorization.

properties.name: Grantee
properties.description: The AWS account ID of the grantee of the cluster.

type.description: The AWS account ID of the grantee of the cluster.

properties.name: Grantor
properties.description: The AWS account ID of the cluster owner.

type.description: The AWS account ID of the cluster owner.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the authorization action.

type.description: The status of the authorization action.
